a.n: Molinard, Comme Un Parfumeur En France

p.d: Maison Molinard is based in Grasse. Tracing its history from 1849 to the present, we discover a story of family know-how handed down through the generations in the purest French tradition. Molinard is a brand built on the complexity of its perfumes, its outstanding packaging and its pioneering spirit. Directed by: Sonia Medina (France, 2017)
